spells.description: Hypergrade fireball causing fiery explosions.
Rain of burning cinders engulfing the chosen area.
Manifest flaming wings for swift flight.
Envelope oneself in a cloak of protective fire.
Conjure ropes of fire to bind an enemy.
Harness the power of the sun into a focused beam of energy.
Unleash a breath of fire, incinerating anything in its path.
Create a swirling vortex of fire, distracting or confusing enemies.
Engrave a fiery rune on the ground that explodes when trespassed.
Use the rebirth property of fire, healing severe wounds.
Cause a huge boulder to roll towards enemies.
Manipulate landscapes at will.
Create a whirlwind of sand and rocks for confusion and attack.
Harden the skin to a stone-like quality for defense.
Conjure a prism of crystal around your foes.
Make the ground tremble and crack beneath your enemies.
Grow a strong, sturdy barrier of iron-like wood.
Raise a high-speed storm of sharp rocks.
Hands of solid rock emerge from the ground to hold enemies.
Speak to the Earth and its creatures.
Create a massive wave that sweeps everything in its path.
Draw health-restoring water from the ground.
Generate a sphere of intensely cold water, freezing foes.
Conjure a screen of mist for stealth and escape.
Open a short-range portal through bodies of water.
Shape water into a crackling whip.
Control the tides, making water bodies recede or surge.
Create an armor of ice that also chills attackers.
Summon a whirlpool to disrupt and swallow enemies.
Cause a calming, steady rainfall.
Create a small tornado that pulls in or deflects projectiles.
Summon a strong wind to knock back opponents or clear smoke.
Create an air barrier around you that deflects attacks.
Form wings of air currents for flight.
Release a concentrated, forceful blast of wind.
Vaporize partially allowing temporary movement through air.
Create a pocket of breathable air around you underwater or in toxic environments.
Summon a fierce windstorm that sweeps across the battlefield.
Manipulate air to propagate powerful sound waves that stun enemies.
Cause a sonic shockwave with a clap, disorienting foes.
